## Accessing the tableau API
## Can only really get what you need from the graphql API
```json
query dataSourceInfo {
  embeddedDatasources {
    name
    upstreamTables {
      name
      fullName
      schema
      database {
        name
      }

    }
    downstreamWorkbooks {
      name
      owner {
        name
      }
      projectName
    }
  }
}   
```
## Need rest api for other workbook info
